entry.title: newsletter#001
entry.summary:
General Tech

  • Backblaze released there harddrive stats for 2022

  • servethehome tested the new Intel NUCs and they sound great

  • Linux Parallel CPU BringUp has seen some promising work, the last view weeks

  • Don't know if one should cry or laugh Microsoft seems to deeply integrate Adobe Reader into Edge - will …
entry.content:
General Tech

  • Backblaze released there harddrive stats for 2022

  • servethehome tested the new Intel NUCs and they sound great

  • Linux Parallel CPU BringUp has seen some promising work, the last view weeks

  • Don't know if one should cry or laugh Microsoft seems to deeply integrate Adobe Reader into Edge - will buy Popcorn for the first Exploits to arrive

  • Wanna build an ARM Cluster? Kickstarter Campaign for a great Raspberry PI CM4 Computer Blade

  • DDR5 in the Server market, what it brings and where it gets us

  • the always great feistyduck newsletter is out delivering many TLS specific news

Security

  • Short Summary of ExpelSecurity´s Annual Trend Report shows that Adversary-in-the-middle (AiTM) phishing increases - Defense with FIDO2-Token or Certificate-Auth !

  • ACME for TLS certificate-enrollment changed the TLS ecosystem in a good way, but more change is needed and the IETF is working on it

  • New Year, new Bugs in Server BMCs

  • Interesting Critique on Intel TDX

  • Abusing the KeePass Plugin-Cache

  • canarytokens.org - release some new goodness - creditcard canary tokens

Misc

  • Balloons in the stratosphere? why and for what, explains Frank Rieger - (German)

  • Ransomeware Diaries from the lockbit ransomeware crew some pretty interesting insides, into the ransomeware world

  • Reversing UK Rail Tickets

  • how to completely own an airline in 3 easy steps

Courses / Howtos / Books / Guides / Talks

  • Google - Technical Writing Courses - had a quick skip and this looks pretty good

  • Videos from the FOSDEM 2023 Conference got released - Linux, Networking, Security, Coding & many more interesting topics
